Portable OpenSMTPD

Normal OpenSMTPD development produces a very small, secure, and easy to maintain version for the OpenBSD project. The portability team takes that pure version and adds portability code so that OpenSMTPD can run on many other operating systems.

The OpenSMTPD provided here is known to run on the following Unix operating systems:

  • FreeBSD
  • NetBSD
  • DragonFlyBSD
  • Linux
Until we have our first stable release, you can fetch our latest snapshot:
  • opensmtpd-201207111000.tar.gz [2012/07/11]

www@openbsd.org
$OpenBSD$
